data.name: The Devil's Chosen
data.detailed_description:
Deal With The Devil




YOU MAY ALSO LIKE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1955330/Save_Room__Organization_Puzzle/


About the Game


In The Devil's Chosen, classic action, tense exploration, puzzle-solving gameplay and the worst demons you can imagine in a classic card world style.


Players team up with an unnamed character, because that's not important, and his pathetic attempt to have a girlfriend, which he sometimes doesn't understand, how she always gets him into trouble, today was no different, the fate of hell it's in your hands!

  • A whole new perspective – Have you ever seen anything like this? All handmade. Cards?
  • Terribly realistic visuals – The sickest monsters ever seen by mammals.
  • Face the grotesque hordes – Demons will run after you as they react in real time, taking instant visible damage, making every bullet count.

  • Iconic Gameplay – Engage in frantic combat with enemies, explore menacing dark corridors, solve puzzles to access areas and collect and use items discovered around the environment in a constant and terrifying fight for survival.
  • See your favorite characters under your survivors collection - Today you try to be the hero, and help the gang!
  • Take the role of the Demon Destroyer - Find new weapons, places, enemies, friends, and a whole lot of ugly stuff.

Time to get ready and *%@&* everything!!!!!!!

data.short_description: Swim after an uneasy night with your girlfriend in a dark, strange and sinister forest, feel the intense exploration, create new weapons, find secrets, fight demons and strange animals never seen before, and of course don't forget to rescue your girlfriend from the Old One.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra 10.12 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core i5 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
